data.eml:eml: A new species of Meharia Chrétien, 1915 (Lepidoptera, Cossidae) from the United Arab Emirates, with a world catalogue of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yakovlev, Roman V. (2014): A new species of Meharia Chrétien, 1915 (Lepidoptera, Cossidae) from the United Arab Emirates, with a world catalogue of the genus. Zootaxa 3895 (3): 401-410, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3895.3.4
